title: Ashinaga Ojisama
sinopse: In order to take over his parents company Yuuya enters a different company to learn practical management. The manager there supports Yuuya and also has a secret love for him. In addition Yuuya has a daddy long leg that he adores, who is helping him behind-the-scenes but he may be closer than Yuuya thinks and the manager seems to hide something too.
